mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT perms FROM sys_user_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON sys_menu.id = sys_role_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} AND sys_menu.menu_type IN ( 'C', 'F' ) AND sys_menu.`status` = 0 AND sys_menu.del_flag = 0
